name: Missile Command - Tribute
description:
This game was a tribute for Missile Command.
This game was made for Missile Command Game Jam, this is a reupload of the game made for that jam.

You need to save the cities. You have control of 3 missile launching stations with limited ammo. Survive the wave of nukes as long as you can.

Controls ------------------------

Left Click to target the incoming missile.

"Space" to launch the missile.

Use "Q , W , E" to select different missile launchers.

Use "A" and "D"  to rotate the camera.

Good Luck, Commander!
